ing: 4 cups diced, cooked chicken breast meat
des: "A quick and easy fruit and curry chicken salad. . . Other items may be added as desired, e.g., raisins, pineapple, coconut, nuts of your choice, green onion, etc."
ins: In a large bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, chutney, curry powder, lime zest, lime juice and salt.  Add chicken and toss with the dressing until well coated.  Add more mayonnaise to taste, if desired.  Cover and refrigerate until serving.
